content:
Good one, but a lot of things to edit though

> Missing constraints for number of words in `S` and character range

> Will an empty string be expected ? (Macro said nothing ..)

> But when he said the 0th and 1st word, it does not satisfy such constraints:

   > When he's trying to say the nth word, he will stammer as many times as he did previously ((n-1)th word) plus as many times as he did even before that ((n-2)th word).

  Hence, it should be explicitly mention that he will NOT STAMMER when speaking the 0th word, and will ONLY STAMMER ONCE when speaking the 1st word.
